overview:
What is a “Rogue CFO”?

“The term “rogue” may be used to describe an independently-minded person; one who rejects conventional rules of conduct in favor of following personal values. ”

I’m not your everyday CFO. Anyone who works in the startup and small business world knows that it takes a different breed of person to thrive in a high energy, high stress, high growth world. Entrepreneurs are creative people, don’t you want a management team that shares the same passion, creativitiy and energy? That’s my business model: think outside the box, act outside the box, and build companies that thrive.

Chief Financial Officer (CFO)

My ultimate goal in helping companies grow by pairing my expertise and experience with yours. I work with only a few carefully selected companies at a time, devoting my time and resources to helping you grow and avoid all the pitfalls of being a relatively new company.

How I Add Value to Your Company:

Early Stage:

* Business Plans
* Financial Forecasts
* Executive Summaries
* Investor Presentations
* Growth Strategy

Launch & Growth Stage:

* Raising Investor Capital
* Cash Management
* Financial Reporting & Analysis
* Annual Budgeting

Continued Growth:

* Board of Directors
* Management Consulting
